page.title: 20Cornton Prison,Stirling(Ctd)
page.content: A doctor attends the prison every day, a dentist weekly. Inmates can take educational courses to help them when they come out. Some sit exams such as {0 and H Grades.}Also there are leisure activities, such as sewing, knitting, woodwork etc. All these practical activities are to gear the inmates for life out of prison. Social workers visit the prison to help inmates. Ministers visit the prison to take services in the chapel and to visit individuals. In spare time inmates can go to the prison shop, see TV etc. They are allowed a visit fortnightly for an hour. Families can spend 2 hours together. A Christmas concert & sports day are held annually. After a time inmates can go on visits outside accompanied by an officer. COMPILED BY PUPILS OF RAPLOCH AND ALLANS PRIMARY SCHOOLS, STIRLING.
